question: What is the name of the paper strip test for SARS-CoV-2 diagnosis to be rolled out by the Ministry of Health?
explanation:
The Union Minister for Health Harsh Vardhan has stated that the Health Ministry would soon roll out paper strip test for SARS-CoV-2 diagnosis named FELUDA.
The test strip has been developed by CSIR-Institute of Genomics and Integrative Biology (IGIB), and has been approved by the Drug Controller General of India.
